technologies.name: React
technologies.description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces, particularly web applications.

technologies.name: TypeScript
technologies.description: A strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript.

technologies.name: Docker
technologies.description: A containerization platform for packaging applications with their dependencies.

technologies.name: Kubernetes
technologies.description: An open-source container orchestration platform for automating deployment, scaling, and management.

technologies.name: GraphQL
technologies.description: A query language and runtime for APIs that enables clients to request specific data.

technologies.name: Micro Frontends
technologies.description: An architectural approach to decompose frontend applications into smaller, manageable pieces.

technologies.name: Figma
technologies.description: A collaborative interface design tool for creating, prototyping, and sharing designs.

technologies.name: Webpack
technologies.description: A module bundler for JavaScript applications.

technologies.name: Vite
technologies.description: A fast build tool and development server for modern web projects.

technologies.name: Svelte
technologies.description: A radical new approach to building user interfaces with compile-time optimizations.

technologies.name: Serverless
technologies.description: Cloud computing execution model where cloud providers manage server infrastructure.

technologies.name: WebAssembly
technologies.description: A binary instruction format for stack-based virtual machines.

technologies.name: Microsoft Intune
technologies.description: Cloud-based unified endpoint management platform for managing and securing devices across the organization.

technologies.name: Meta Quest for Business
technologies.description: Enterprise VR platform for immersive training, collaboration, and productivity applications.

technologies.name: Meta Horizon Workrooms
technologies.description: Virtual reality collaboration platform for remote meetings and team collaboration in immersive environments.

technologies.name: Microsoft Endpoint Manager
technologies.description: Comprehensive device management solution combining Intune and Configuration Manager for unified endpoint management.

technologies.name: VMware Workspace ONE
technologies.description: Digital workspace platform that delivers and manages any app on any device through a single platform.

technologies.name: Apple Business Manager
technologies.description: Web-based portal for IT administrators to deploy Apple devices, purchase and distribute apps, and create Managed Apple IDs.

technologies.name: HoloLens 2
technologies.description: Mixed reality headset for enterprise applications including remote assistance, training, and visualization.

technologies.name: Pico Enterprise
technologies.description: Enterprise VR solution for training, collaboration, and business applications with centralized device management.
